full_description:
NZXT F120Q 120mm Quiet Airflow Casing Fan

NZXT F120Q 120mm Quiet Airflow Casing Fan is designed to be quiet. This NZXT CAM-compliant fan is designed to cool large pockets of air. The innovative Fluid Dynamic Bearing has a 60,000-hour life expectancy. The frame's anti-vibration rubber corners decrease noise, and the PWM fan is ideal for cooling adjustments. The Quiet Airflow Fan is an all-purpose fan suitable for any PC design. It's efficient, competent, and quiet. When there is no resistance, these fans move massive quantities of air swiftly. Use on the top, front, and back panels only. Fan blades are meticulously designed to cool all components. It keeps temps cool while making little noise. With Quiet Fans, this case fan helps keep big volumes of air from the top and back of your PC. If you're searching for a fan that can swiftly expel massive amounts of air, we've got you covered. The NZXT F120Q 120mm Quiet Airflow Casing Fan has no warranty.

NZXT F120 RGB 120mm Casing Fan

The NZXT F120RGB 120mm RGB Casing Fan adds a splash of color while keeping things cool. This fan is a high-airflow fan that delivers optimal cooling airflow. NZXT CAM is compatible with fan controls and lighting effects. This fan is intended to maximize airflow and can attain speeds ranging from 500 to 1800 rpm. The long-lasting fluid dynamic bearings are designed to last for up to 60,000 hours while working silently at 17.2 to 27.5 dBA. Its Smart frame design with anti-vibration rubber corners reduces noise and uses a PWM fan for optimal cooling settings. The NZXT F120RGB 120mm RGB Casing Fan has no warranty.

full_description:
NZXT F120P 120mm Static Pressure Casing Fan White

The NZXT F120P 120mm Static Pressure Casing Fan in White is intended for high-performance PC cooling systems. It is ideal for cooling radiators and heat sinks since its main goal is to provide efficient airflow through small spaces in your computer. Designed specifically for AIO liquid coolers, the F120P fan excels at creating static pressure, which is needed for forcing air through small openings. This fan effectively eliminates heat from your components by creating a powerful airflow with its seven blades. The F120P is equipped with features designed to improve the user experience. Anti-vibration rubber corners included in the fan's frame substantially reduce noise levels by attenuating vibrations when the fan is operating. This guarantees quieter operation—even while carrying large loads. Long-term dependability is ensured by the Fluid Dynamic Bearing used by the fan, which helps it run quietly and has an amazing lifespan of up to 60,000 hours. PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) technology in the F120P allows for exact control over fan speed for optimal cooling performance. The fan's controls and lighting effects are completely compatible with NZXT CAM software, giving customers who want more customization choices simple access to monitor and alter fan settings to fit their tastes and system needs. For ideal temperature maintenance within your PC, the NZXT F120P 120mm Static Pressure Casing Fan is a dependable option, regardless of creating a high-performance gaming rig or a workspace that needs effective cooling.

full_description:
NZXT Aer P120 120MM Static Pressure PWM Casing Fan

Enhance your desktop computer's cooling with the black NZXT Aer F120 120mm Fan. This fan features a chamber design with winglet tip blades to minimize drag and optimize both airflow and pressure, reaching speeds between 500 and 1500 rpm. Its durable fluid dynamic bearings are made to perform reliably for over six years, operating quietly between 22 and 31 dBA to reduce distractions while you work, watch movies, or play games. The PWM static pressure fan features a chambered-intake and exhaust to enhance the overall airflow and pressure. Each fan blade has a specially designed winglet tip that reduces drag and boosts performance. The copper fluid dynamic bearings are designed to last for over six years while delivering reliable and quiet performance.

full_description:
NZXT Aer RGB 2 140mm Case Fan

The NZXT Aer RGB 2 140mm Case Fan is a high-performance fan designed to enhance airflow and provide advanced lighting effects for your computer case. Powered by NZXT CAM, these RGB case fans offer seamless software control and endless customization options. The Aer RGB 2 140mm Case Fan is the ability to connect up to five fans per channel. This allows for the efficient management of multiple fans in your system. Additionally, you can mix and match these fans with any RGB Lighting & Fan Control accessory, providing flexibility in creating your desired lighting setup. The NZXT CAM software enables you to control the lighting effects and customize them according to your preferences. Whether you prefer static colors, dynamic patterns, or synchronized lighting with other components, the software allows you to achieve the desired aesthetic. The fan's unique and custom-engineered light guide ensures stunning visual effects with uniform light dispersion. This results in a visually appealing and harmonious lighting display within your computer case. The Aer RGB 2 140mm Case Fan features a daisy-chain capability, allowing you to connect and group multiple fans together for additional lighting effects. This feature enables you to create more complex and intricate lighting setups. The fan operates with a PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) design, providing optimized cooling while maintaining a whisper-low noise level of 22 dBA. This ensures efficient cooling and a quiet computing experience. The fluid dynamic bearing of the fan is engineered to last over six years, ensuring durability and longevity in its operation. This feature contributes to the reliability of the fan, making it a long-lasting investment for your system. The RGB Lighting & Fan Control supports up to a maximum of 40 LEDs per channel, five Aer RGB 2 fans, or six RGB Lighting & Fan Control accessories in total. This allows you to expand and synchronize your lighting setup to create a visually stunning and cohesive system. The NZXT Aer RGB 2 140mm Case Fan combines advanced airflow performance, customizable lighting effects, and durable construction, making it an excellent choice for users looking to enhance the aesthetics and cooling capabilities of their computer case.
